title: Uruk Hunter (4U188)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	6
Card Type:	Minion • Uruk-Hai
Strength:	12
Vitality:	3
Site:	5
Game Text:	Tracker. Fierce. Unbound Hobbits may not be discarded. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is killed, exert this minion twice to exhaust a companion.
Lore:	”'We came out of Isengard, and led you here, and we shall lead you back the way we choose.'”
Rarity:	U
